title: IStackedBalloonOptions.QuantityPlacement
description: Gets and sets the placement of a BOM item quantity with respect to its balloon.
returns: Placement of BOM item quantity value as defined in swBalloonQuantityPlacement_e ; only swBalloonQuantityPlacement_e.swBalloonQuantityPlacement_Top and swBalloonQuantityPlacement_e.swBalloonQuantityPlacement_Bottom are valid options for stacked balloons
remarks: See the SOLIDWORKS Help for additional details about stacked balloons.
